entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h then light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
